text: Yazeed Al-Bakr (; born 11 November 1995) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a right back for Pro League club Al-Ahli and the Saudi Arabian national team. Al-Bakr is an academy graduate of Al-Zulfi. He started his career at Al-Zulfi and spent multiple seasons at club and making appearances in the Second Division and the Third Division. On 5 December 2017, he joined Pro League side Al-Faisaly. On 31 January 2019, he signed his first professional club contract with the club.
